text: avaribbarū bāgilineḍege dhāvisidaru – āke avara (yūsuph‌ra) aṅgiyannu hindininda (eḷedu) haridaḷu mattu avaribbarigū bāgila baḷi ākeya gaṇḍanu edurādanu. Āke hēḷidaḷu; ninna patnige keḍukannu māḍabayasidavanige, serevāsa athavā bhārī kaṭhiṇa śikṣeyallade bēre yāva pratiphalavannu tānē nīḍabahudu
